greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Numerators of rational valued sequence whose Dirichlet convolution with itself yields A234840, which is a multiplicative permutation of natural numbers.
comment: Question: Are all terms positive? No negative terms in range 1 .. 2^17. Also (checked for n <= 2^17) the denominators seem to be given by A317932.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..16384
formula: a(n) = numerator of f(n), where f(1) = 1, f(n) = (1/2) * (A234840(n) - Sum_{d|n, d>1, d<n} f(d) * f(n/d)) for n > 1.
program: A234840(n) = if(n<=1,n,my(f = factor(n)); for(i=1, #f~, if(2==f[i,1], f[i,1]++, if(3==f[i,1], f[i,1]--, f[i,1] = prime(-1+A234840(1+primepi(f[i,1])))))); factorback(f)); \\ _Antti Karttunen_, Aug 23 2018
DirSqrt(v) = {my(n=#v, u=vector(n)); u[1]=1; for(n=2, n, u[n]=(v[n]/v[1] - sumdiv(n, d, if(d>1&&d<n, u[d]*u[n/d], 0)))/2); u}; \\ From A317937.
xref: Cf. A234840, A317932 (seems to give denominators, see A261179).
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Aug 23 2018
